name: Prince Xizor (V)
Lore: 'Falleen gangster and leader. Black Sun agent. Dark Prince of the Black Sun crime syndicate. Fortifies his personal defenses with information gathered by his agents.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Other Black Sun agents are forfeit +1. Your unique (•) gamblers, gangsters, smugglers, and thieves are Black Sun agents. Once per turn, may take Unexpected Interruption into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 4.',
